name: PEPPERONI

description: Grilled courgette, aubergine and peppers topped with rocket.

description: Anchovies, oregano and garlic.

name: BBQ CHICKEN
description: BBQ sauce and thin chicken strips.

name: DIAVOLO

name: CHICKEN KIEV
description: Chicken, mushrooms and garlic.

name: MEAT FEAST
description: Pepperoni, salami, cotto ham, chicken & garlic.

name: CAPRA (V)
description: Goats cheese, sun dried tomatoes, peppers & onion.

name: GIARDINIERA (V)
description: Asparagus, artichoke, mushrooms, peppers, olives and garlic.

description: Salami, pepperoni, spicy meatballs, jalapenos, egg, black olives

description: Parma ham and shaved parmesan.
